file_content.text: We got those medical supplies just in time.
Please, hurry. I'm not sure how long these patients will last without supplies.
I've told you all I know. The Voss commando database will have more information.
You all must be headed for the battlefield. Could we speak, first?
Master Jedi, welcome to our field hospital. May I have a word?
Major. Glad to see you're not injured. We're in a tight spot.
Captain. I've heard a bit about your skills. I hope you can help.
Doctor Varen, Republic field medic. The Voss have suffered some heavy losses, and we're running low on medical supplies.
Rumor has it the supplies were stolen. The Voss asked for help recovering them, but I'm no soldier. You might do better.
We're in Gorma-Koss, fighting a war against the Gormak... I know where I'd look.
The Voss would like to keep this operation quiet. Heavy losses, dwindling supplies--makes them look bad.
Here. Temporary credentials to access the Voss commando database. Good luck--we need those supplies.
Please, reconsider. The Voss are fighting a war here. They need our help.
Another time, please. There are many Voss injured here.
